short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Family tree maker with lots of customization. Set reminders and take notes for members. Download your family tree as a HQ image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect extension to build your family tree. You can create multiple families that can share different members between them. Export HQ images of your family tree with different themed shapes. You can also set reminders for family members and get browser notifications for those reminders.

It is a privacy-focused extension that only asks for minimal permission. Your family data is kept in your browser. We don't have any access to it. We also offer an offline backup feature. For more information, please visit our website https://thefamilytree.app

✪ FEATURES ✪

★ Family Tree Management ★
Create and manage multiple family trees with detailed member information, including names, genders, biographies, birth, and death dates. Add numerous members and record relationships such as marriages, divorces, adoptions, and disowning. Share members across different trees and use the auto-arrange feature to organize them. View all family members globally for a comprehensive perspective.

★ Customization ★
Personalize your family tree with various theme options. Customize colors, text styles, and shapes, including member icons (rectangle, circle, square) and relationship lines. Adjust the distance between members and choose their arrangement by age or couple order. Your custom theme settings are automatically saved for future use.

★ Exporting ★
Export high-quality images of your family tree for easy sharing or printing.

★ Notifications and Reminders ★
Set and manage reminders for important dates related to family members, and view them in a calendar format. Receive daily notifications to keep you informed about upcoming events.

★ Rich Text Notes ★
Attach rich text notes to family members to include detailed information and additional context.

★ Security and Backup ★
Protect access to your family trees with password protection and use the backup feature to safeguard your family tree information.

✪ IN APP PURCHASES ✪

★ Enthusiast Version ★
Available for free without sign-up. Add up to five families with a total number of 50 members. You also get 10 reminders, HQ image downloads (watermarked), and multiple theme shapes.

★ Premium Version  ★
Access to all features with higher families, members, and reminders. To learn more, please visit https://thefamilytree.app/
